metaDescription: Learn about egg donation treatment in detail.
title: Egg Donation

whatIs.title: What Is Egg Donation?
whatIs.paragraph1: When a woman’s own eggs are insufficient, low-quality, or absent, egg donation is a method that allows pregnancy by using donor eggs.
whatIs.paragraph2: Our team selects a suitable egg donor matching the recipient’s blood type and physical features. The eggs are fertilized, embryos are created, and transferred to the recipient to achieve pregnancy.

who.title: Who Is Egg Donation Suitable For?
items: Women with decreased egg reserves due to age
Women whose embryos are genetically unhealthy
Those with low egg quality due to genetic disorders
Women after chemotherapy or ovary removal

why.title: Why Choose Egg Donation Instead of Adoption?
why.paragraph: Experiencing pregnancy and motherhood is every woman’s right. Science offers this opportunity through egg donation.
